TEXT.TITLE: SEA GALLEY STORES INC <SEAG> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr four cts vs one ct Oper net 108,000 vs 30,000 Revs 12.8 mln vs 14.8 mln Note: Current qtr figures exclude operating loss carryforward gain of 57,000 dlrs, or two cts per share vs gain of 21,000 dlrs, or one ct per share. Reuter
